name: Descriptive Menu Plugin
author: Kerry Ritter

sections.description: The Descriptive Menu Widget takes the manual work out of rendering a WordPress menu with menu item descriptions. Built for those experienced with CSS, the generated markup gives you full control over how your menu is displayed, including an optional icon element.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place the widget in the sidebar of your choice.
  4. Style the way you want!

short_description: The Descriptive Menu Widget adds a WordPress menu to a page and includes each menu item's description.
description: The Descriptive Menu Widget takes the manual work out of rendering a WordPress menu with menu item descriptions. Built for those experienced with CSS, the generated markup gives you full control over how your menu is displayed, including an optional icon element.
